article_title: Volunteer spirit reaches new heights: Student volunteers improve medical care in remote areas
article_text:
No, It's up to the students to make the university inclusive.

No, promoting diversity can take place with each preexisting office.

Yes, an office for diversity and inclusion is necessary to keep up with our collegiate peers.

Yes, UT is a hostile environment and its students deserve a safe college experience.

article_metadata.author: Tanner Hancock, News Editor

og.description: The woman was in her mid 30’s, a heavy smoker unlikely to quit — and she had the lungs to prove it.
